attributes.action: Have a 6 week summer holiday this year for schools not 39 days!
attributes.additional_details: Because alot of the kids at school are exhausted from the school year and the extra 3 days we deserve arent given to us!
attributes.background: give us the extra 3 days we need!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The length of school holidays are a matter for schools and local authorities.
